thread.title: Nitin Gadkari to lay foundation stone of 4-laning of NH-202 in Telangana | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Nitin Gadkari to lay foundation stone of 4-laning of NH-202 in Telangana | Deccan Chronicle

author: PTI
title: Nitin Gadkari to lay foundation stone of 4-laning of NH-202 in Telangana | Deccan Chronicle
text:
PTI | October 21, 2015, 18.37 pm NH 202 (Photo: YouTube screenshot) Hyderabad: Union Minister of Road Transport and Highways Nitin Gadkari will on Thursday lay foundation stone for 4-laning of Yadadri-Warangal section of the NH 202 in Telangana.
"The work on the NH-202 (new number NH 163) is estimated to cost Rs 1,905 crore and complete in 30 months," an official statement said.
"The scope of work involves 4-laning of 99.10 km section connecting Yadgiri and Warangal. The project also includes 4 bypasses (for Vangapalli, Aler, Janagaon and Warangal), 2 ROBs, 4 vehicular under passes, 1 overpass, 3 pedestrian underpasses, 3 major bridges and 25 minor bridges," it said.
"On account of this project, the total four lane connectivity will be established between Hyderabad and Warangal, which promotes the industrial activities around Warangal and also saves fuel, time, apart from improving the safety and comfort, it added.
States: Telangana Nitin Gadkari foundation stone 4-lane NH202 Telangana Also Read Titanium case: Congress MP K V P Ramachandra Rao to get relief Our callous approach to safety kills children Road rage is dangerous Two Maoists killed in encounter at Tadvai in Telangana
